sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-book-details', templateUrl: './book-details.component.html', styles: [ ] }) export class BookDetailsComponent { book = [ { title: 'To Kill a Mockingbird', description: 'A Pulitzer Prize-winning novel set in the Deep South of the 1930s.', unitcost: 9.99, isbn: '9780446310789', nbofPages: 281, language: 'English' }] }

book-details works!

{{book.title}}

{{book.description}}

  • Author: {{book.author}}
  • ISBN: {{book.isbn}}
  • Pages: {{book.nbofPages}}
  • Language: {{book.language}}
  • Price: {{book.unitcost | currency:'USD':'symbol'}}
